title: script font to identify
content:
Hi everyone. Is someone able to help me by identifying this script font ?  
thanks a lot.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016100023im_/http:/typophile.com/files/s_3917.jpg)
author: numero7

comments.content:
It looks like **[Lobster Two](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016100023/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Google-Web-Fonts&ffam=Lobster%20Two%20-%20Regular&fid=c54655e3a9b664ca3bc6b752cf534251&fsize=60&text=faith&fit=1)** by Pablo Impallari (2011), now part of Google Web Fonts

-----------------------------------------------  
I found it using Find my Font - [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016100023/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
